item.title: Convert to an RGB Image to a Grayscale Image
item.description: How to Convert an RGB Image to a Grayscale Image In this article, I will explain how to convert an RGB image to Gray Scale image. I will do it using Python 3 with Sublime Text Version 3.1.1 as a text editor. We need to install some required packages. Before installing these packages, you may need modify “.bash_profile” on your Terminal and deal with compiler problems. So, make sure that you already have those packages.

item.title: Build Yolov3
item.description: How To Build Yolov3-Tiny On MacOs What is Yolo? You only look once (YOLO) is a real-time object detection system. It is the fastest model for object detection. Comparison to Other Detectors: YOLOv3 is extremely fast and accurate. You can easily tradeoff between speed and accuracy simply by changing the size of the model, no retraining required! In this post,I will guide you how to build Yolov3-tiny on macOS terminal :

item.title: Homebrew
item.description: On this blog, I will give brief information about Homebrew and list some basic commands of Homebrew. What is Homebrew? Homebrew is a software package management system that simplifies the installation of software on Mac OS. What does a package manager do? Packages are installable bundles of source code. A package manager is a tool which automates the process of installing, updating, and removing packages. More Information about Homebrew ; Homebrew is written in the Ruby programming language and targets the version of Ruby that comes installed with the macOS operating system.
